extendedInfo.description: âââââTablet Free Version ââââââ The BEST kids learning app available on Android Phone and Tablet! â âKID Zoneââ Featured in to 50 Best Android Apps and Games for Kids in 2012! â âAndroid Star Performersââ Featured App on âSmartAppsForKidsââ One of the Best Ads Free app for Kids â âBest Apps Everââââââ  Good, simple, effective game. Quick support with good attitude. No dodgy ads is a Big plus - safe to leave the game with children ~ a Happy Parent Reviewâââââ Wonderful - My toddlers loves this app work great on my HTC and my tablet.. ~ a Happy Parent ReviewVersion Note: This is the Free Tablet version of the App. If you wish to download the Full version please check the following app on the Play store: Kids Preschool Games TAB PaidIf you wish to download the phone version of the App, please check the following app on the Play store: Kids Preschool Games ABC Paidâââââ 	WHY download this App? 	âââââUpdated with special Christmas features, KIDS Opedia Early English is an encyclopedia for kids.There are 25 categories in total. The app comes with standard and basic categories like Alphabets, Numbers, Colors, and Animals. Other interesting categories include Fruits, Transport, Time, Body Parts, Family, Countries and Flags and many more.KIDS Opedia works on a L.A.R.A model (Learn, Assess, Report, Analyse).This application is not only meant to teach kids but allows them to test their knowledge and understanding through a variety of quizzes. It further allows the parents / guardians to view the Quiz reports and analyze their kids progress.âââââ 	WHAT to expect from the App? âââââThere are more than 25 categories and 500 flashcards bundled into a single app. The app also provides more than 5 different quiz modes. Additionally it has a strong and robust reporting mechanism. Parents can create multiple profiles and thus use the same app for more than one kid.The app provides separate Kids and Parents Mode of operation. Every Quiz is designed so children enjoy success time after time and receive positive reinforcement to motivate them to keep learning. The game does not overload children and parents and provides a stress free environment for fun learning.âââââ 	WHOM is this app for?	âââââThe app is a great fun based educational tool for children in the age group (2 to 7 years old) ranging from toddler, preschool, kindergarten, as well as school-going.âââââ 	WHERE to contact?	âââââWe work hard to add new features to this app. We would love to hear from you about your experience with the app, and any feedback or suggestions or feature request that you would like to share directly to us at kidsopedia@credipoint.com.Keywords: Kids, Educational, Reading, Letters, Phonics, Reading, Children, Games, Preschool, Educational games, Child, Game for children, Games for kids, School, Kindergarten, Shapes, Puzzle, zoo, animals, toy, best-selling, fruits, painting, flashcards, A to Z, flash cards, books, first words, early English, for kids, toddlers, child, baby, apps for kids, educational apps for kids, app for kids, apps for kids, Kids Learning Game

reviews.title: Let down
reviews.comment: I am a fellow dev for android and I have a daughter and saw this app on youtube so i downloaded first on her Tablet 7 inch and the screen was way way too big i think it would only work or be compatible with 10 inch which is something you should consider.. After i then downloaded the ABC version which i assumed is for phones but... Again Failed on the phone in the ABC wont boot and I Have Samsung Galaxy Note 2 (trust me it can do everything) But you app doesnt work.. I started to jus download the cracked version but wasnt worth the time if it fails on my tablet and my Note 2. I think you should take the app down and work out the kinks and bugs. .The idea its selft and the layout has GREAT potential but as is now.. sorry to say better off with regualr kids apps that actually function properly on android devices.. 5 stars after bugs are worked out
